section.title: 日期范围
section.programlisting: import pandas as pd date = pd.date_range('2021-1-1', '2021-11-30', freq='15d') print(date)

import pandas as pd import numpy as np import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
df = pd.DataFrame(np.random.randn(15, 4), index=pd.date_range( '2021/01/01', periods=15), columns=list('ABCD'))
df.plot() plt.show()
